value: It's nice when things are going well.
What is making you so happy?
That's good to hear, <name>. Now, why don't you calm down a little?
What has you down in the dumps <name>?
That's a shame your having a bad day <name>!
That's a bummer <name>, want to talk about it?
Is there anything I can do to cheer you up <name>?
